fHMM 0.3.0.9000

Reference

All functions

check_date()

Check date format "YYYY-MM-DD".

compare()

Comparison of multiple fHMM_model.

compute_T_star()

Compute lengths of fine-scale chunks

compute_ci()

Confidence intervals

compute_residuals()

Compute (pseudo-) residuals.

decode_states()

Decode the underlying hidden state sequence.

download_data()

Download financial data.

fHMM_colors()

Set color scheme for visualizations in the fHMM package.

fHMM_events()

Check events.

fHMM_parameters()

Set and check parameters for the fHMM package.

fHMM_sdds()

Define state-dependent distributions.

fit_model()

Model fitting for the fHMM package.

is_number()

Check if x is a ((non)-negative) ((non-)positive) (integer) numeric (vector).

is_tpm()

Check if x is a transition probability matrix.

match_all()

Match positions of two numeric vectors "as good as possible".

plot(<fHMM_data>)

Plot method for an object of class fHMM_data.

plot(<fHMM_model>)

Plot method for an object of class fHMM_model.

plot_ll()

Visualization of log-likelihood values.

plot_pr()

Visualize pseudo residuals.

plot_sdds()

Visualization of estimated state-dependent distributions.

plot_ts()

Visualize time series.

predict()

Prediction

prepare_data()

Prepare data for the fHMM package.

print(<fHMM_controls>)

Print method for fHMM_controls.

print(<fHMM_data>)

Print method for fHMM_data.

print(<fHMM_events>)

Print method for fHMM_events.

print(<fHMM_model>)

Print method for fHMM_model.

print(<fHMM_parameters>)

Print method for fHMM_parameters.

print(<fHMM_predict>)

Print method for fHMM_predict.

print(<fHMM_sdds>)

Print method for fHMM_sdds.

print(<fHMM_trouble>)

Print method for fHMM_trouble.

print(<summary.fHMM_data>)

Print method for the summary of fHMM_data.

print(<summary.fHMM_model>)

Print method for the summary of fHMM_model.

read_data()

Read data for the fHMM package.

reorder_states()

Reordering of estimated states.

set_controls()

Set and check controls for the fHMM package.

simulate_data()

Simulate data for the fHMM package.

simulate_markov_chain()

Simulate a Markov chain.

simulate_observations()

Simulate state-dependent observations.

solve_trouble()

Debugging.

summary(<fHMM_data>)

Summary method for fHMM_data.

summary(<fHMM_model>)

Summary method for an object of class fHMM_model.
